name: Scallop Ceviche En Brochette
keywords: appetizer, main course, bell pepper, sea scallop, dairy-free, gluten-free, nut-free, vegetarian
recipeIngredient: 1 small red onion, peeled and minced
1 small jalapeno chili pepper, seeded, deveined and minced
1 red bell pepper, seeded, deveined and cut into 1/2-inch dice
1 yellow bell pepper, seeded, deveined and cut into 1/2-inch dice

recipeInstructions.text: In a glass or ceramic bowl, combine the lime juice, lemon juice, salt, pepper, garlic, red onion, jalapeno and 1/2 cup parsley. Add the scallops. Cover with plastic wrap and refrigerate for at least 6 hours, turning once.

Remove the scallops from the marinade. Alternate pieces of red and yellow peppers with 4 scallops on each of the 8 skewers. Arrange on a platter and sprinkle with the reserved parsley. This can be made up to 24 hours before serving.
